item.title: Torque Limiter System – Torque Limiter Control – One Per Gear

remarks.para: Torque limiter control for one brake per truck may be inoperative provided Maximum Quick Turn-around Weight is reduced by 10,000 lbs (4,536 kgs).

note.para: The following EICAS message(s) may be displayed:

numlitem.para: Ensure not more than one torque limiter control channel inoperative per truck.
Reduce the maximum Quick Turnaround Weight 10,000 lbs.
Apply a 10,000 lb weight penalty to the Quick Turnaround Limitation in AOM Chapter 5.2.

placard.para: Placard near Captain’s PFD on P-1-1 panel ____ Torque Limiter Control "INOP". Enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
